definition: last day of a lunar month/dark/night
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: It was once believed that visitors to one's home could bring good or bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 人们曾经相信，来访者可以带来好运或晦气。

sentences.english: I am unlucky enough to miss the last train.
sentences.chinese: 我真晦气，错过了末了一班火车。

sentences.english: She's said to be a jinx, who would bring bad luck to whoever she marries.
sentences.chinese: 有人说阿谁女人是个扫帚星，谁跟她成婚谁晦气。

definition: a moldy smell/damp and rotten/fig. rotten bad luck
to cause sth unfortunate to happen (to oneself or sb else)/to do sth inauspicious/to have a stroke of bad luck
messenger of death (cf Irish banshee)/person bringing bad luck
comet or supernova viewed as evil portent
to have bad luck/to be out of luck
to have one's spirits dampened/to feel disappointed
bearer of ill luck/person with the evil eye/comet
